codelog.content:
Plan for the day

  • Finish watching Complete Intro to Web Development, v2.
  • Start watching - Mastering Chrome Developer Tools, v2 by Jon Kuperman. Master your devtools!

Learned today

  • You can pipe stuff in Shell into the clipboard, e.g. cat index.html | pbcopy.
  • I have finished the "Complete intro to web development" class!

Resources list

  • Helper to create licenses for Github projects
  • How to contribute to open source for the first time
